name: Remember (itch) (Omar Khalil)
description:
In a beautiful landscape filled with fragments of forgotten memories, recover a girl's lost identity by listening to sounds, moving around and aligning the lines into patterns that represent her past. Remember is a mobile game that is controlled by your mobile's movements. Video demo:

Programming and 3D: Omar Khalil. Art and UI: Osama Hadeed (https://www.instagram.com/ozmarmalade/)
